content.body: hsivonen: https://github.com/validator/htmlparser/pull/113 is ready for review again. Responded to all the review comments, and tried to align to follow the spec as closely as possible — and to make it do so as clearly as possible. Dropped in a lot of comments with verbatim text and spec links. Maybe overkill in some cases, but I figured it better to err on the side of greater clarity.
